page.title: 09PERSONALITIES
page.content: Mrs.Vera Rigby lives in Croftlands and is a store detective. She works for Group 4 Total Security. The stores she works for are B&Q, Woolworths and the Co-op, but she can also work in other shops when off duty by using a thing called citizen's arrest. She checks the orders, fire safety and sometimes even the cashiers. She goes round shops looking for people picking things up and putting them in their pockets or even up their jumpers! She then follows them round till they go out of the door without paying.Then she stops them,tells them who she is,and asks the manager of the shop if he wants to call the police. If the police come the thief goes to court and the stolen object acts as evidence. Andrew aged 9.
